in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the collection and use of personal data by companies. i think it's inappropriate to require personal information, such as email addresses and phone numbers, for certain offers or services. i'm questioning how we can protect our privacy in a world where data privacy seems to be a joke. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect with others who share similar concerns.
